channel.title: Cucumis Melo on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Cucumis Melo on funPlantGenes

item.title: Cm-eIF4E
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Cm-eIF4E Gene Name: eukaryotic translation initiation factor 4E Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: Melon RNA interference (RNAi) lines silenced for Cm-eIF4E show broad virus resistance.

item.title: Cm-ERS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Cm-ERS1 Gene Name: ethylene response sensor 1 Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: Transgenic Lotus japonicus with an Ethylene Receptor Gene Cm-ERS1/H70A Enhances Formation of Infection Threads and Nodule Primordia.

item.title: Cm-ETR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Cm-ETR1 Gene Name: ethylene receptor 1 Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: In fully enlarged fruit the level of Cm-ERS1 mRNA was low in all tissues, whereas that of Cm-ETR1 mRNA was very high in the seeds and placenta.

item.title: CmBr
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmBr Gene Name: Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: CmBr confers fruit bitterness under CPPU treatment in melon.

item.title: CmDXS2a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MELO3C017499 Gene Symbol: CmDXS2a Gene Name: 1-deoxyxylulose 5-phosphate synthase Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: In the case of DXS, three genes encode functional DXS activities which fall into previously established type I (CmDXS1) and II (CmDXS2a and CmDXS2b) categories, while a fourth DXS-like gene belonging to the type III group did not encode a protein with DXS activity.

item.title: CmDXS2b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MELO3C014965 Gene Symbol: CmDXS2b Gene Name: 1-deoxyxylulose 5-phosphate synthase Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: In the case of DXS, three genes encode functional DXS activities which fall into previously established type I (CmDXS1) and II (CmDXS2a and CmDXS2b) categories, while a fourth DXS-like gene belonging to the type III group did not encode a protein with DXS activity.

item.title: CmERFI-2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MELO3C002624 Gene Symbol: CmERFI-2 Gene Name: ethylene response factor I-2 Genome: melon genome database (http://cucurbitgenomics.

item.title: CmERS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmERS1 Gene Name: ethylene response sensor 1 Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: Analyses using membrane fractionation and green fluorescent protein imaging approaches indicate that CmERS1 is predominantly associated with the endoplasmic reticulum (ER) membrane.

item.title: CmFBN1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MELO3C007423 Gene Symbol: CmFBN1 Gene Name: FIBRILLIN1 Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: Carotenoid sequestration protein FIBRILLIN (CmFBN1) participates in CmOR-regulated Î²-carotene accumulation in melon.

item.title: CmLHP1A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MELO3C006209 Gene Symbol: CmLHP1A Gene Name: LIKE HETEROCHROMATIN PROTEIN1 Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: CmLHP1 proteins play a key role in plant development and sex determination in melon.

item.title: CmLHP1B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MELO3C022484 Gene Symbol: CmLHP1B Gene Name: LIKE HETEROCHROMATIN PROTEIN1 Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: CmLHP1 proteins play a key role in plant development and sex determination in melon.

item.title: CmLOX08
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MELO3C011885 Gene Symbol: CmLOX08 Gene Name: Lipoxygenase 8 Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: Cloned the CmLOX08 promoter of melon (Cucumis melo) and identified the main promoter regions regulating transcription in response to signalling molecules and abiotic stresses.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmOR Gene Name: Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: Carotenoid sequestration protein FIBRILLIN participates in CmOR-regulated Î²-carotene accumulation in melon.

item.title: CmPIRL6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MELO_Chr02G10770 Gene Symbol: CmPIRL6 Gene Name: PPR Interacting with RNA editing Factor 6 Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: MELO_Chr02G10770 was predicted to encode a leucine-rich repeat protein, PIRL6.

item.title: CmPPR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MELO3C003069â70 Gene Symbol: CmPPR1 Gene Name: white-flesh Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: QTL analysis of flesh color intensity identified a candidate white-flesh gene (CmPPR1), one of two major loci determining fruit flesh color in melon.

item.title: CmThAT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MELO3C024190 Gene Symbol: CmThAT1 Gene Name: Thiol acyltransferase1 Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: Thiol acyltransferase (CmThAT1) gene was identified within the QTL interval of its product, S-methyl-thioacetate, a key component of melon fruit aroma.

item.title: CmTST2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmTST2 Gene Name: tonoplast sugar transporter2 Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of the tonoplast sugar transporter CmTST2 in melon fruit increases sugar accumulation.

item.title: PDC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MELO3C009145 Gene Symbol: PDC1 Gene Name: Plant pyruvate decarboxylase 1 Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: PDC1, a pyruvate/Î±-ketoacid decarboxylase, is involved in acetaldehyde, propanal and pentanal biosynthesis in melon.

item.title: PDC2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MELO3C007227 Gene Symbol: PDC2 Gene Name: Plant pyruvate decarboxylase 2 Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: In an effort to elucidate the biochemical pathways involved in volatile aldehyde biosynthesis en route ester formation in melon, we identified two genes (PDC1 and PDC2) expressed in ripe melon fruits and exhibiting high homology to plant pyruvate decarboxylases.
